panels.scene: A bustling city park filled with trees, grass, and flowers. Spiderman is swinging from tree to tree, observing the lush greenery around him.

dialogue.speaker: Spiderman
dialogue.text: Wow, this park is so full of life!

panels.scene: Thanos appears suddenly, wearing his famous mask and holding a device that emits a dark energy. He scowls at the plants.

dialogue.speaker: Thanos
dialogue.text: These plants are stealing the energy I need!

panels.scene: Spiderman lands on a branch and confronts Thanos.

dialogue.speaker: Spiderman
dialogue.text: What are you doing, Thanos? Plants aren't your enemies!

panels.scene: Thanos activates his device, causing the plants to wilt and lose their vibrant colors.

dialogue.speaker: Thanos
dialogue.text: I need energy, and they're wasting it on photosynthesis!

panels.scene: Ironman swoops in, noticing the withered plants.

dialogue.speaker: Ironman
dialogue.text: Spidey, what's going on here?

panels.scene: Spiderman points towards Thanos.

dialogue.speaker: Spiderman
dialogue.text: Thanos is disrupting photosynthesis!

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: Photosynthesis is how plants make their own food using sunlight, water, and air. They release oxygen, which we breathe. We need to stop Thanos!

panels.scene: Ironman and Spiderman face Thanos, preparing to fight.

dialogue.speaker: Ironman
dialogue.text: We have to protect these plants!

panels.scene: Thanos launches a powerful attack, causing the heroes to stumble.

dialogue.speaker: Thanos
dialogue.text: You can't stop me!

panels.scene: Spiderman and Ironman regroup and strategize.

dialogue.speaker: Spiderman
dialogue.text: We need to teach him about photosynthesis!

panels.scene: Ironman uses his suit to project an animation of the photosynthesis process.

dialogue.speaker: Ironman
dialogue.text: Look, Thanos! Plants are essential!

panels.scene: Thanos watches the animation, intrigued.

dialogue.speaker: Thanos
dialogue.text: So, they create their own food...

panels.scene: The heroes use the distraction to disarm Thanos' device.

dialogue.speaker: Spiderman
dialogue.text: And release the oxygen we need!

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: Plants provide food and oxygen through photosynthesis, making them vital for our world!

panels.scene: Thanos, defeated, realizes the importance of photosynthesis.

dialogue.speaker: Thanos
dialogue.text: I didn't understand before...

panels.scene: The plants begin to regain their vibrant colors, and the park flourishes once more.

dialogue.speaker: Spiderman
dialogue.text: Now, the park can thrive!

panels.scene: The heroes share a moment of triumph.

dialogue.speaker: Ironman
dialogue.text: We saved the day!

panels.scene: Dr. Gyaan appears, smiling.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: You both did a great job!

panels.scene: Ironman and Spiderman thank Dr. Gyaan.

dialogue.speaker: Ironman
dialogue.text: Thanks, Dr. Gyaan!

panels.scene: Dr. Gyaan nods and encourages the heroes.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: Remember, photosynthesis is essential for our planet!

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: Plants convert sunlight, water, and air into food and oxygen through photosynthesis!

panels.scene: The heroes and Dr. Gyaan stand among the flourishing park, enjoying the fresh air.

dialogue.speaker: Spiderman
dialogue.text: Fresh air feels so good!

panels.scene: Dr. Gyaan explains the chemical equation for photosynthesis.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: Photosynthesis is represented by this equation: Sunlight + Water + Air (Carbon Dioxide) → Food (Glucose) + Oxygen

panels.scene: Ironman looks thoughtful.

dialogue.speaker: Ironman
dialogue.text: Fascinating!

panels.scene: Spiderman gazes at the sky, reflecting on the experience.

dialogue.speaker: Spiderman
dialogue.text: I'll always appreciate the plants around me!

panels.scene: Dr. Gyaan continues teaching.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: Photosynthesis is carried out by the chloroplasts in the leaves of plants!

panels.scene: Ironman and Spiderman share a friendly gesture.

dialogue.speaker: Ironman
dialogue.text: Thanks again, Spidey!

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Gyaan
dialogue.text: Photosynthesis is vital for our planet's ecosystems!
